name: Sheriff West
description:
Sheriff West is a quick-fire dueling game. Jump in the wild west and defeat all bandits in a classic western duel.

The game features 9 levels with unique characters, each faster than the previous.

Find it too difficult? You can use the chickens as a barrier between you and the bandit, but be careful, because scorpions keep the bandits safe!

Itch.io is the perfect place to start building a community. It also offers a way to support the developer beyond paying the full game price. If you like the game and want to see more you can leave a tip and follow me!

The main goal of the game is to create a community around it and expand the game together. Also to support me a little, so I can keep at it!

I've setup a discussion board if you want to be part of the future updates. Links are at the end of the page!

Future updates will be free!

There are so many things I want and will add to the game one at a time depending on the feedback.

If you want to see the game on Mobile and /or Steam you can leave a tip(even a 1$ helps) or at the very least follow me to get notified on updates!

Me:


The creator of the soundtrack:


Sam D-T Music

If there's any problem you can post it down below or contact me on any of the social links or on my personal email: m.stanimirov81@gmail.com - I reply fast!
